sections.title: General Booking Conditions for a Guided Tour:
content: All prices are inclusive of VAT; for online purchases, the amounts paid in advance are considered as a deposit.
The booking is considered confirmed only after written communication (via email) from Les Crêtes.
Please notify in advance any allergies and intolerances food or special needs. If not notified in advance, any responsibility is declined.
Tastings are dedicated to adults, as it is not allowed to serve alcohol to minors under 18.

sections.title: General Conditions for Modifying or Canceling a Guided Tour Booking:
content: Modifications must be communicated in writing (via email) within 2 working days from the date of the visit, providing first name, last name, and booking code:

subcontent: 1 - in case of reduction in the number of booked participants and modification of the type of tasting, if communicated within the mentioned period, the corresponding amount will be credited back directly to the credit card used, otherwise Les Crêtes will retain the due amount.
2 - in case of increase in the number of booked participants and modification of the type of tasting, the booking must be confirmed by Les Crêtes.

content: Any cancellation of booking must be communicated in writing (via email).

The cancellation of the booking must be received within 2 working days from the date of the visit, providing first name, last name, and booking code. If communicated within the mentioned period, the corresponding amount will be credited back directly to the credit card used, otherwise Les Crêtes will retain the total amount.

Les Crêtes reserves the right to change the event location or cancel the event at any time, due to force majeure and/or impossibility (including, but not limited to, weather events that make it impossible to organize the event, impediments caused by the Covid-19 emergency, etc.). Participants are guaranteed a full refund of the ticket, using the same payment method used for purchase, whether the event is canceled or the location change prevents the attendee from participating in the tasting tour.

sections.title: General Behavior Rules for Visitors:
content: Visitors are requested to arrive 20 minutes before the start of the visit to check-in.
The visit time is fixed and non-changeable, respecting the reservation of the rest of the participating group.
Entry to the establishment's premises is allowed only if accompanied by authorized personnel.
All visitors are requested to always follow the instructions of their guides. In particular, it is necessary to:

subcontent: Pay maximum attention to moving vehicles (e.g., forklifts);
In case of emergency (fire, natural disaster) stay calm, do not leave the guide, follow the guide's instructions and use the escape routes indicated by the appropriate signage.

content: Pets: small pets are welcome, if inside the appropriate carrier, for more information please contact us.
